alert.note: Alert for Western Aleutians (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 18 at 4:14PM AKDT until March 19 at 7:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 7 PM AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 60 to 70 mph with gusts up to 85 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Aleutians. * WHEN...From 1 PM to 7 PM AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A potent North Pacific low is forecast to lift across the Western Aleutians on Sunday. Cold air wrapping around the low will spill across the Western Aleutians in the form of high winds gusting up to 85 mph, as the timing of the low`s passage coincides with the low`s peak intensity. Winds should quickly diminish before midnight Sunday night.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Prepare for the possibility of widespread power outages. Use caution if you must drive.
